pkgmetadata.longdescription: Network-Guided Penalized Regression (NetGreg) // A network-guided penalized regression framework that integrates network characteristics from Gaussian graphical models with partial penalization, accounting for both network structure (hubs and non-hubs) and clinical covariates in high-dimensional omics data, including transcriptomics and proteomics. The full methodological details can be found in our recent preprint by Ahn S and Oh EJ (2025) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2505.22986.
